description: A former government research facility, now abandoned and split between fire and ice. The island is filled with deadly poison gas (Shinokuni) and serves as Caesar Clown's base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Law's Escape Plan Executed
keyEvents.description: Law reveals he had swapped seastone chains during his stay at the laboratory and orchestrates the escape.
keyEvents.significance: The laboratory becomes the setting for the counterattack against Caesar.

keyEvents.title: Escape from Shinokuni
keyEvents.description: Multiple groups flee across the island from the deadly poison gas.
keyEvents.significance: The poison gas creates urgency and forces all groups toward the laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Laboratory Gate Cut Open
keyEvents.description: Zoro and Kin'emon cut through the sealed laboratory shutter to enter.
keyEvents.significance: Allows the outside group to escape the poison gas.

keyEvents.title: All Groups Reunite in Laboratory
keyEvents.description: All scattered groups successfully enter the laboratory and reunite.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the confrontation with Caesar.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory serves as the main battleground for this episode

description: The main research facility on Punk Hazard where Caesar Clown conducts his experiments. The laboratory has sealed shutters to protect from the poison gas outside.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Opens Gate
keyEvents.description: Luffy's group enters the laboratory and opens the gate for the G-5 Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Begins the safe haven stage before confronting Caesar.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is the safe zone and upcoming battleground
